text: Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
The kingdom of God is within you.
So God created man in his own image.
I AM THAT I AM.
Is it not written in your law, I said, Ye are gods?
Be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
Ye are the light of the world.
Beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord, we are changed...
What things soever ye desire, believe that ye receive them...
Faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
As a man thinketh in his heart, so is he.
If thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.
Whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
Thou shalt also decree a thing, and it shall be established unto thee.
Think on these things: whatsoever things are true...
Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on thee.
According to your faith be it unto you.
Know ye not that ye are the temple of God?
God calleth those things which be not as though they were.
Enter into thy closet... and pray to thy Father in secret.
He that believeth on me, the works that I do shall he do also.
Greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly... within us.
Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find.
Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you.
My word... shall not return unto me void.
Death and life are in the power of the tongue.
Ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
If God be for us, who can be against us?
That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.
